body:
This is my second attempt to address #6076 but with minimal changes:

- Fix for `ConfigFormatError`. It doesn't fail to initialize anymore if the validated schema contains an array: TypeError: list indices must be integers, not str.
- Fix for `schema/compilers.py`: it doesn't allow for almost an arbitrary set of properties anymore.
- Tests to check that the fixes work.
title: Bugfix for compiler schema #2
